Description:
The I&C Construction Supervisor require to following skills and qualifications: Excellent construction site management skills
Have a thorough knowledge and proven ability in construction and erection techniques with emphasis on instrumentation, instrument cabling/tray etc, impulse tubing, DCS equipment and operator interface units/screens etc.
Shall be familiar with the QC process for pre-commissioning instrumentation and control systems including continuity and functional testing
Team Player
Strong communicator written and oral
Strong and effective coordinator
Experience of working in a multicultural project team
Familiar with the construction drawing.
Excellent scheduling and contract management skills
Excellent technical report writing skills
Knowledge of construction tools and equipment such as I&C drawings, materials, surveys, budgets, permits, safety aspects, and so onJob Details
